name: Click to Shoot (Daniel Stokoe)
description:
A short game prototype created as part of a university master's degree course in which games are designed within a week to fit a given task. In this case, the task was to create something in which something happens when the mouse is clicked so from that I developed a one click space invaders game. This is the second version of the prototype, after receiving feedback on my initial work.

The goal of the game is to destroy all invading shapes by clicking to shoot. Shooting also changes the direction of the player ship which is in continuous motion.

Created in Clickteam Fusion 2.5
